content: I'm getting a warning that my RelatedPerson profile doesn't depend on US-Core. Except that the official published version of US-Core doesn't have a RelatedPerson profile. I'm assuming this warning will be allowed to be bypassed without needing a waiver by FMG. I get that the comparison is done even if you don't declare a dependency on US Core, but I think that it should only use the latest officially published version, i.e. 4.0.0 and not the latest version of any type, i.e. 4.1.0.
FMG will ignore. Think of it as a heads up about stuff you'll have to worry about soon.
